titleStmt.title: Proclamation for discovering and apprehending housebreakers, thieves and robbers, and their resetters
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Eliot, Gilbert, Sir, 1651-1718.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the second day of August, and of Our Reign the twelfth year 1700.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot. Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
